description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Salad Sorbet recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.

name: Fruit Salad Sorbet Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup frozen berries, slightly thawed (raspberries, blueberries or strawberries)
8 cup frozen fruit, peeled, deseeded, slightly thawed (nectarines, melon, peaches, pears)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the frozen fruit and berries until a pur√©e forms. Add milk and vanilla and process until smooth. Place in an airtight container and freeze overnight to firm.
To serve, scoop the sorbet into bowls and top with fresh berries.
